name: Free Girly Illustrations
description:
A pack of free illustrations with characters that represent everyday actions in real life such as traveling, cooking or drawing among others. Perfect to enhance your project with a girly touch!


A style of characters with a limited color palette, which makes a perfect contrast with light backgrounds, creating symmetry and accompanied by geometric patterns.


This collection of free illustrations is part of Artify Illustrations, which features 5K illustrations packaged in over 70 design styles, with a built-in editor to adjust the design to your liking.


Highlights


  • Easy to edit and change colors
  • Organized components
  • Illustrations are scalable to any size you need (Vector sources)
  • Easy to use for developers (SVG included)


Meet Artify illustrations and get over 5000 vector illustrations in more than 70 unique design styles


And check the Creative Toolkit, the biggest pack of design resources ever: +5000 illustrations, 300 design vector packs, a powerful online editor & a huge gallery with thousand of designs, 5000 3D icons and characters
